physical_appearance:The image depicts the constituents of a developing tank
 together with two reels of photographic films. The components of the developing tank are black in colour
 except for a red rim on the developing tank container. The film reels are white in colour. They are placed around the centre column of the developing tank. The lid of the developing tank container is separated from its body as well.

context_22:1970 - present
context_23:1970
context_24:present
sgcool_label_text:Such a tank is used to load reels of photographic film just before the development process
 which involves various steps such as the stop bath and the washing of film. This developing tank is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by renowned photographer Willie Tang.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image depicts the constituents of a developing tank, together with two reels of photographic films. The components of the developing tank are black in colour, except for a red rim on the developing tank container. The film reels are white in colour. They are placed around the centre column of the developing tank. The lid of the developing tank container is separated from its body as well.
